notes:
While [Retreat to Emeria] is a very good card, I think I'd go with the sweet rare I haven't got a chance to play with yet here and take [Hero of Goma]. Giving your team indestructible so you can crack in with impunity seems great if you're even a little ahead.

Other than the Hero and the Retreat, I think [Outnumber] is the most interesting card as an efficient removal spell.
